With over 2 million copies sold, the new episode of
the most internationally successful S.T.A.L.K.E.R
series seamlessly connects to the first part of the
Shadow of Chernobyl. S.T.A.L.K.E.R: Call of
Pripyat takes PC gamers once again into the
vicinity of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor that
exploded in 1986. This so-called "Zone" is a highly
contaminated area cordoned off by the military and
now is combed through by the so-called stalkers
modern fortune hunters, in search of unique
artifacts. In the role of Agent Alexander
Degtyarev, who is dressed up as stalker, the player
has to investigate the mysterious disappearance of
five military helicopters and thereby stand one's
ground against the various stalker groups
